body: Way back when I was in the 8th grade gym class was normally coed, but when they wanted us to do wrestling (the gym teacher was also the wrestling coach) they split the boys and girls up. Us boys had to do wrestling and they had the girls do these stretching exercises on the other side of the gymnasium. I had no interest in watching two dudes rolling around together on a mat (Not my thing but nothing against those who do) so I started looking in the direction of the girls and quickly noticed that many of them had no panties on under their gym shorts. When stretching in certain positions you could see straight up the short pant legs. Beaver town! I elbowed the kid next to me, "Hey, Jimmy, look over there!" A few minutes later half of us guys had directed our gazes at the girls instead of the wrestling action going on. The teacher noticed just as the girls also noticed us staring at them. Coach was like, "I want everyones eye forward, now!" It was fun while it lasted.
this has a lot of Jojo references. 10/10
